programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Julian's preparing for “spring has sprung”, the Greendale school play, when pat gets a special delivery call. It's a yeti costume for Bill. When Pat is diverted into the countryside by PC Selby, he spots one of Alf's missing sheep - and she's about to have a lamb! Alf can't get there as his quad bike is being fixed, so Pat offers to take the sheep in his van. But the sheep is reluctant to move. Meanwhile, Bill is worried that his costume won't turn up and he'll let his classmates down. Out in the fields, Pat hits upon the idea of dressing up like a woolly sheep by putting on the yeti costume. It works! But there's another surprise in store as he delivers the sheep to alf at the school - she's had her lamb! Bill, Pat and lamb all play starring roles in the play. Mission Accomplished!

But when Noddy arrives at the party, the other toys are all scared by a strange noise. Noddy decides to investigate: what's making the scary noise? Using his investigating skills and following all the clues, Noddy arrives at the Naughticorn Stables where he realises that the scary noise is actually a slowed down tune on the music player. The Naughticorns have played it so much that the battery is running out. The Naughticorns have been taking the music player all around Toyland, desperately trying to fix or hide. Noddy reassures them it's not broken, it just needs new batteries in. The Naughticorns say sorry for scaring everyone and Pat-Pat's Pumpkin Party can at last get under way. Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Loch Lomond: A Year In The Wild

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: There’s a new “babblist” in town- someone who claims to understand baby talk. Boss Baby spots this fraud right away;and must debunk his tactics before he scams the playgroup parents. Meanwhile;Tim tries to sell magazines with Boss Baby’s help.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss Baby loves awards- and the Golden Rattle trophy is no exception. When presented with the chance to win an award at a company retreat;he must choose between his pride and his team.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: George and Harold race against Mr. Krupp to try to get him fired before they get expelled

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In the season opener, George and Harold have returned to school due to a technicality, but the school has been taken over by Melvin and a cyborg Melvin from the future! Their goal is to make the school extremely difficult by replacing all the teachers with Teachertron robots. Suffering under the new regime and without Mr. Krupp/Captain Underpants on hand to help, the boys hypnotize gym teacher Mr. Meaner and turn him into Sergeant Boxers to fight back.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Tired of the Melvins ruling the school, the boys realize that they need Mr. Krupp to make the school at least bearable. Unfortunately, Krupp has run off to Ecuador to look for a fabled fountain. So the boys form the M.I.S.F.A.R.T.S. - Mega Incredible Search Force Adventure Rescue Team Squad - to travel to Ecuador and bring Krupp back, whether he wants it or not.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh!
programme.desc: Oh introduces Tip to the strange world of Boovian Earth tours; Rejected by the Junior Lady Rangers, Oh and Tip form their own all-inclusive scouts, sparking a turf war

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: Skid unleashes an evil robot on Turbotown and has to get rid of the monster himself; Turbo falls for and betroths a head-eating mantis princess.

programme.title: Dinotrux
programme.desc: Ton-Ton and the Trux must protect a cluster of fragile Ankylodump eggs from the Scraptors after an earthquake separates them from their herd

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: The Wanderers and Whitebeard visit Wizard Blizzardbeard in Quebec City, Canada, for the big Wanderers Ice Hockey Tournament. When Odlulu uses the Invisibility Key on herself and Fritz, they become an unstoppable, invisible hockey-playing duo. Wally and Wenda must pursue Odlulu on the rink and throughout Quebec City to retrieve the Invisibility Key.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Julian's preparing for “spring has sprung”, the Greendale school play, when pat gets a special delivery call. It's a yeti costume for Bill. When Pat is diverted into the countryside by PC Selby, he spots one of Alf's missing sheep - and she's about to have a lamb! Alf can't get there as his quad bike is being fixed, so Pat offers to take the sheep in his van. But the sheep is reluctant to move. Meanwhile, Bill is worried that his costume won't turn up and he'll let his classmates down. Out in the fields, Pat hits upon the idea of dressing up like a woolly sheep by putting on the yeti costume. It works! But there's another surprise in store as he delivers the sheep to alf at the school - she's had her lamb! Bill, Pat and lamb all play starring roles in the play. Mission Accomplished!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa is sure he has found the perfect present for each of his friends… but what happens if the packages get mixed up?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: The Naughticorns have borrowed Noddy's music player to practise a special dance for Pat-Pat's Pumpkin Party. But when Noddy arrives at the party, the other toys are all scared by a strange noise. Noddy decides to investigate: what's making the scary noise? Using his investigating skills and following all the clues, Noddy arrives at the Naughticorn Stables where he realises that the scary noise is actually a slowed down tune on the music player. The Naughticorns have played it so much that the battery is running out. The Naughticorns have been taking the music player all around Toyland, desperately trying to fix or hide. Noddy reassures them it's not broken, it just needs new batteries in. The Naughticorns say sorry for scaring everyone and Pat-Pat's Pumpkin Party can at last get under way. Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Stingo's cousin Hornetto pays a visit to the garden and quickly charms all the tots. Stingo and Slugsy decide he must be stopped from staying permanently at all costs!

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal

They each pick a plant to take care of, and for Kelp it’s a sad, almost dead plant that he falls in love with.

When the humans try to neautralize the bots, they find a new host: Captain Underpants. Now they must shrink down to go into Captain Underpants’ brain and defeat the nanobots’ leader, Nanozero. But they need help: Captain Underpants’ brain cells to the rescue! And when it’s all over, George and Harold will finally be able to go to summer camp.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight

And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Dali & Cocky Prince
programme.desc: Price was never a concern for Dali, who was born rich. However, in an overnight, she is left with nothing due to her father's sudden death and bankruptcy. In front of Dali, who is struggling to save the museum that her father wanted to protect until the end, a man shows up, demanding her to pay off a debt of $2,000,000. And that man is Muhak, whom she mistakenly believed to be a big hand in the art world while she was working as a researcher in the Netherlands.

programme.title: The Seasons
programme.desc: On a Friday night when a week starts and end, a talk show brings you music and stories that will "get rid of all your worries and all your concerns."

programme.title: Two Days and One Night 4
programme.desc: Two-day road trip to the beautiful spots in all the corners of Korea! Instead of fancy studio, this on-the-road reality show takes place in the rural sides. While over 10 million Koreans travel abroad each year, the "2 Days and 1 Night" casts travel around Korea - to the mountains, farms, fishing villages, islands - where you can meet the welcoming smiles of our neighbors and the beautiful nature that cleanse our eyes.

programme.title: The Return of Superman

He had been thoroughly hiding his identity, afraid that he might be an obstacle in his daughter's life. The father and daughter meet the "only ones" in their lives and put back together the pieces of their broken hearts.

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3

programme.title: Wusong VS Ximenqing
programme.desc: Wu Song finds out about his sister-in-law’s affair with a rich man, Ximen Qing. Qing sets Song up and have him exiled for a year, during which his hapless brother is murdered and cremated. When Song finally returns home, he takes the case to court but the judge brushes it aside and closes it abruptly. Can Song finally avenge his brother’s death?

programme.desc: Because of Mira’s (Kiray Celis) determination to convinced her loved one study, she, together with her mother Linda, Mang Johnny and Paul all have graduated with flying colors with the help of DepEd’s Alternative Learning System.

programme.title: 100 Tula Para Kay Stella
programme.desc: Throughout his four years in college, Fidel, a stuttering student, tries to finish 100 poems dedicated to Stella, an aspiring but frustrated rock star, to win her heart.

programme.title: Nilalang
programme.desc: Nilalang tackles the underbelly of corrupt Philippine cops with the Japanese 'Yakuza' and its links to a centuries' old curse that may be responsible for the spate of serial killings happening in Manila.

programme.title: Talk Back and You're Dead
programme.desc: This is a story of Samantha Perez (Nadine Lustre), a girl who unbelievably fell in love with a delinquent, hot-headed guy named Timothy Odelle Pendleton aka Top (James Reid), the leader of the gang, Lucky 13.

programme.title: Beauty and the Bestie
programme.desc: For an important case, a policeman needs the help of his former best friend to impersonate the daughter of a foreign dignitary in a beauty pageant.

programme.title: I'm Sorry My Love
programme.desc: In the hope of landing a job that will eventually enable her to pay for her sister’s operation, Tinay (Judy Ann Santos) leaves her small fishing village and heads for Manila.

programme.title: Ikaw at Ako at Ang Ending
programme.desc: When a bagman meets a hotelkeeper, he knows she's the one. To hide and start anew, they go to the northernmost part of the country where an unexpected end awaits them.

programme.title: Elemento
programme.desc: The story is about Cristine (Kara) and her struggle when her son Lucas (Albert Silos) returned from school field trip, with a different soul.

programme.title: Frasier S5 E04 - The Kid
programme.desc: This season of FRASIER finds Niles and Frasier competing again, this time over who will find their father Martin the better birthday gift. Meanwhile, Daphne finds her favorite pub invaded by a familiar and unwelcome interloper.

programme.title: Frasier S5 E05 - The 1000th Show
programme.desc: This season of FRASIER finds Niles and Frasier competing again, this time over who will find their father Martin the better birthday gift. Meanwhile, Daphne finds her favorite pub invaded by a familiar and unwelcome interloper.

programme.title: CSI S3 E17 - Crash & Burn
programme.desc: The series enters its third season riding high as network television's top-rated drama. There is, therefore, no need for CBS to make any major cast changes, however, there are two significant additions to the cast lineup for season 3. A romantic interest is created for series regular Jorja Fox (Sara Sidle) in the form of Hank Peddigrew (Christopher Wiehl), a handsome paramedic. Also, recurring character Detective Lockwood ( Jeffrey D. Sams ) is seen on a more frequent basis. The season's most significant story development involves CSI head man Gil Grissom ( William L. Petersen ). After a few instances in which he notices that he is experiencing some hearing loss, Grissom is diagnosed with a hereditary disorder which threatens to culminate in total deafness. As the season draws to a close, Grissom undergoes surgery to correct this problem, however the results of the operation remain unclear until the beginning of season four.

programme.title: The Incredible Hulk S3 E09 - Captive Night
programme.desc: You wouldn't like him when he's angry. You'll LOVE him! Follow the adventures of Dr. David Banner, a scientist who, after "an accidental overdose of gamma radiation interacts with his unique body chemistry", turns into a raging monster when agitated.

programme.title: Law & Order Special Victims Unit S10 E16 - Ballerina
programme.desc: The Special Victims Unit, a specially trained squad of dedicated detectives in the NYPD, who investigate these vicious felonies. These are their stories.

programme.title: Narito Ang Puso Ko
programme.desc: Ellen and Louie are estranged lovers whose son is accidentally shot by Tato, a son of a prominent politician. However, in their constant vigil besides their comatose son, their feelings towards each other are rekindled.

programme.title: Dalhin Mo Ako Sa Langit
programme.desc: Lani (Ynez Veneracion) is an ambitious village lass who wants to better her life. She uses her beauty towards this end and manages to worm her way into a rich family.

programme.title: Tikboy at Pamboy
programme.desc: Tikboy at Pamboy

programme.title: Apoy Sa Lupang Hinirang
programme.desc: Berting (Jestoni Alarcon) is a forklift operator in Don Franco's (Bernard Bonnin) quarry. Elena (Rina Reyes) is the Don's unica hija, heir to all of his fortune. Berting and Elena fall in love in the most unusual of circumstances.

programme.title: Titser's Enemi No. 1
programme.desc: The four members of the notorious campus gang, D'titser's enemy, were busy playing their bad jokes again on everybody. Their favorite victims were their teachers, who got the lions' share of the gangs' pranks.

programme.title: Pieta 1
programme.desc: The movie tells the story of Amanda (Charito Solis) and her unconditional love for her son Rigor (Ace Vergel). Rigor grows up not having to follow any rules and he does not cultivate a conscience. In his dealings with the underworld, he meets syndicate head Johnny Wilson. Will this pave the way for his all-out excursion to evil?

programme.title: Kahit Konting Pagtingin (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: FPJ teamed up with the Megastar in this enchanting romantic comedy with huge doses of action. A love story of the driver-bodyguard, Delfin and the headstrong, Georgia whom he was able to tame.

programme.title: Batangueño Kabitenyo
programme.desc: This is a story of Magno,who is from Batangas and has the ability to attract women like flies.He goes to Manila hoping to change.

programme.title: Manalo Matalo, Mahal Kita
programme.desc: Mikee played the girl selling lotto tickets. Cesar spent his last ten pesos on a ticket hoping to win the jackpot. The two had some fights, which eventually fade off as both fell in love with each other.

programme.title: Isang Tanong, Isang Sagot
programme.desc: Jason played the role of a rich and bratty student who fell in love with one of his maids, played by the lovely Donna Cruz. Surprised at the turn of events, he tried to hide his feelings by being unkind to the girl.

programme.title: Dyesebel (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The retelling of the classic tale by the great Mars Ravelo. After years of hiding from a cruel, suspicious society on the land, mermaid Dyesebel (Charlene Gonzales) returns and falls in love with a man named Fredo (Matthew Mendoza).

programme.title: Sana Dalawa Ang Puso Ko
programme.desc: A young man who was engaged to be married found himself attracted to another woman. Lacking the nerve to call off the wedding, he went through with the ceremony hopeful that his bride would give him the strength to avoid his other love.

programme.title: Hindi Pa Tapos Ang Laban
programme.desc: In a world where the most corrupt are the most powerful, is there a room a good man’s quest for justice to succeed? The undisputed King of Action takes on the role of a modern day crusader in this exciting, action packed movie that pits the powers of goodness against the forces of evil.

programme.desc: Kitanoumi became the youngest ever yokozuna in 1974 and went on to dominate the ring for a decade. We revisit his career through NHK archive footage and newly recorded interviews.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: CYCLE AROUND JAPAN Highlights
programme.desc: This ride through Nara, site of Japan's ancient capital, takes us through historic locations bright with the colors of fall, a tranquil countryside brimming with the wisdom of the old days.

programme.title: Design Ah neo: Uniforms
programme.desc: Design is fun! Design feels good! Cutting-edge images and music guide children to enjoy exploring the ideas and tweaks in the designs all around us. An episode on Uniforms.

programme.title: Mitateru-phose #6
programme.desc: This program employs "mitateru," a Japanese technique, to inspire children's imagination by encouraging them to view objects differently and develop their unique perspectives and creativity.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: J-MELO
programme.desc: Join May J. for great Japanese music! Three former members of the pioneering J-fusion band CASIOPEA now play as the KATSUSHIKA TRIO. This week, they're in the J-MELO studio to chat and perform.

programme.title: Little Charo
programme.desc: Little Charo is an animation series about a Japanese dog who got lost in NY. "I want to see my owner again!" Charo starts his adventure back home. Season 1-6.

programme.title: Japanology Plus mini
programme.desc: Goldfish in Japan range from beautiful to comical. A single ranchu - known as the "king of goldfish" - can cost millions of yen. In a 5-minute digest, we explore why they are so beloved.

programme.title: A Cat's-Eye View of Japan
programme.desc: In the Western-influenced port town of Kobe, a kitty seeks attention while its owner makes shoes at a custom shop. You'll meet a popular shopping district kitty that has its own designer T-shirt!

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: RAMEN JAPAN
programme.desc: This time in Wakayama, heartland of shoyu, we find a distinctive ramen culture pairing ramen and...sushi?!

programme.title: Core Kyoto mini
programme.desc: Kyoto has many stores specializing in traditional snacks and treats, called Oyatsu. Some purveyors continue to use age-old ingredients and methods.

programme.title: Easy Japanese for Work
programme.desc: Accelerate your Japanese language skills! Learn practical, effective workplace expressions, understand business culture and improve your kanji.

programme.title: Zero Waste Life
programme.desc: Maro Kuratani knits scarves and other items with surplus yarn, using threads of varying color and thickness. She says yarn is the ultimate eco-friendly material as reknitting is always an option.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: The World Heritage Sites in Japan
programme.desc: Mt. Fuji is Japan's tallest and most famous peak. It has long inspired awe and terror, and is a source of artistic inspiration. Join us to explore the iconic beauty of this famous mountain.

programme.title: OKINAWA: Homes
programme.desc: Okinawa Prefecture is a group of subtropical islands in the far south of Japan. We examine its past and present, with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time: Homes.

programme.title: GRAND SUMO Highlights
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from May 11th, Day 1 of the Grand Sumo Tournament in Tokyo.

programme.title: Sumopedia
programme.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

programme.title: Chatroom Japan
programme.desc: All moms need some "me time." That's why one forward-thinking woman in Kyoto established Mamo Heart, a space for mothers to not only relax, but also get their own business ideas off the ground.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Sekiguchi Itaru helped to restore the pipe organ at Notre Dame in Paris, following the cathedral's fire in 2019. He tells us about his work, including the tuning and voicing of these instruments.

programme.title: BOSAI:Science that Can Save Your L

programme.desc: The World Today is the core rolling service of CGTN. keep viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. An international team of reporters will follow the guidance of Occam's Razor - the principle that the simplest explanation is the best one. RAZOR will show that we are already ""living in the future"!

programme.title: The Breakfast Couch - Episode 12
programme.desc: Bridget, James and the team catch up with Richard Roxburgh and Peter Greste about the movie The Correspondent, plus sportstar Erin Phillips, the cast of musical Jesus Christ Superstar and bestselling writer David Baldacci.

programme.title: Culture By Design - Everyday Design
programme.desc: Thoughtful design enhances daily lives in ways we don't always notice. Learn about the creatives who practice forward-thinking designs in Mumbai (furniture design), Yogyakarta (ceramics), and Central Java (bamboo bikes).

programme.title: I Was Actually There - The Beatles' World Record Adelaide Visit
programme.desc: When The Beatles flew into Adelaide, they had no idea that the biggest crowd they would ever witness was waiting for them. Fans describe the life-changing experience of seeing the biggest band in the world arrive.

programme.title: Australia: An Unofficial History - Between Hope and Reality
programme.desc: Amid a period of significant political and social change Australian filmmakers uncover a stark contrast between the nation's progressive aspirations and the real lives of its people.

programme.title: On Country Kitchen - Episode 2
programme.desc: It's season 2 and Derek still can't cook! With locally found ingredients, and a sprinkle of culture and character, Mark and Derek create an Indigenous-inspired feast for the people they visit along their journey.

programme.title: Paradise Kitchen Bali - Episode 8
programme.desc: Discover the delicious and nutritious world of tofu with Lauren as she experiments with textures and flavors pushing the soybean to its limits. Creating dishes like Scramble tofu and the sweet-spicy delight of Tahu Gejrot.

programme.title: Beyond Awesome - Timor Leste's Protein Champions
programme.desc: With malnutrition rates amongst the highest in the world, we go behind the scenes of a popular cooking show in Timor Leste that demonstrates how to create delicious and affordable protein-packed meals.

programme.title: Landline - Episode 13
programme.desc: South Australia's drought-weary farmers put a disastrous season behind them; Bringing back Australia's 'Big Scrub'; Growing native everlasting daisies; plus the Tasmanian artist featured in a blockbuster exhibition.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show - Episode 12
programme.desc: Our hosts match up against Cook Island Heavyweight boxer Teremoana Junior Teremoana and follow undefeated boxing champion Jai Opetaia's journey home to Samoa to reconnect with his community and give back.

As You cannot see the monster, he is able to help other coworkers leave safely and fight to kill the monster!

programme.desc: Amy gets bitten by a rabid bat during her last graveyard shift as a veteran punk rock disc jockey. When a storm traps Amy, her mysterious replacement and an anxious staff inside their small-town radio station, reality starts to distort as they go deeper into the graveyard shift…

programme.title: Babang Luksa
programme.desc: One year after Carlos’ girlfriend Beatrice died, his new love Anna starts to experience horrifying events. Through a spiritualist, Anna knows that she is the reason for Beatrice’s suicide, which leads to the return of her angry spirit to seek revenge. As Anna’s friends begin to die mysteriously one by one, will she be the next victim?

programme.title: Detrimental
programme.desc: You Ji Ren is a blind man who works at a factory in an outlying island. When the factory is cut off from the outside world by a hurricane one day, a monster appears and turns whoever sees it into black shadows. As You cannot see the monster, he is able to help other coworkers leave safely and fight to kill the monster!

programme.title: The Lesson
programme.desc: Two disrespectful and unruly students act out during their teacher, Mr Gale’s class. Unable to tolerate their behaviour, Mr Gale decides to take the two boys hostage and teach them a lesson that they will never forget.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A taxi driver who is constantly judging others by his own standards, also reads into their every move and sets out to help ‘victims’ in his own way. When a woman he likes seems to be bullied by her son, he goes about setting things right for her, even resorting to turning himself into a cold-blooded serial killer…

programme.title: Evie
programme.desc: When young Evie discovers a cursed necklace washed up on the beach, she is unaware of the malevolent force tied to it. As the necklace's dark power begins to grip her, she inadvertently awakens a deadly water demon intent on claiming her and everyone she holds dear.

programme.title: X-Cross
programme.desc: Two female university students go to an isolated hot springs resort for vacation. However, they soon find out that the resort village is the home for lunatics who plan to strap them to crosses and slash their legs. Can they escape from danger in the end?

programme.title: Zombie Island
programme.desc: Jeff, a big fan of zombies, goes to a deserted and mysterious island with his friends hoping to seek out exciting adventures. What started as an adventure turns out to be a horrifying journey as they get trapped on the island and are attacked by the zombies! Their lives are in danger when they fail to fight back, and the game has only just begun!

programme.title: 60 Days In (S8)
programme.desc: Suspicions mount and pressure builds as the participants try to focus on their missions and keep their cover.

programme.title: Undercover: Caught On Tape
programme.desc: ATF Special Agents Dobyns and Kilday put their best feet forward only to have their lives put on the line. Once the investigation wraps, will they become targets for revenge?

programme.title: Interrogation Raw (S2)
programme.desc: After police respond to an apparent suicide, the case takes an unexpected turn when investigators cannot find a gun near the body.

programme.title: American Justice
programme.desc: When an up-and-coming defense attorney is murdered in her office, her colleagues vow to seek justice and "make this right."

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: Those closest to Madison Nygard share the agonising details around the beautiful 16-year-old's terrifying abduction as she walked home from a party.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: When beautiful Jalajhia Finklea vanished the day before her 18th birthday, her Wampanoag Tribe members immediately took action.

programme.title: See No Evil (S6)
programme.desc: The murder of an elderly landlady offers no forensic answers. Can detectives piece together her final days using security footage to discover the motive of a vicious killer before they strike again?

programme.desc: When a young woman dies in a car crash, it's up to the Coroner's Office to trigger an investigation into an accident that may have involved foul play.

programme.desc: An elderly woman gets arrested for domestic battery after fighting with her sister. Meanwhile in Virginia Beach, a 19-year-old boy gets extradited from Miami after missing his court date.

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder (S1)
programme.desc: Christine and Jason Harris fell in love young. Christina finds Jason caring and supportive and after marrying, they have two children. But then Christina makes a shocking discovery.

programme.title: The Torso Killer Confessions
programme.desc: Bergen County (NJ) Chief of Detectives Robert Anzilotti elicited murder confessions from a vicious but relatively unknown serial killer — Richard Cottingham, nicknamed the Torso Killer.

programme.title: Rodéo
programme.desc: Julia has a true passion for motorbikes. One day she meets a gang of urban dirt bike riders and joins their underground world, one mainly made up of young men. But an accident endangers her position as a member of the gang...

programme.title: L'Été Des Chaleurs
programme.desc: On a hot summer's day, a mother needs a break and a child needs to exist.

programme.title: Objectif Monde
programme.desc: Donald Trump's announcement that he wants to annex Greenland, a former Danish colony, has put the spotlight on this Arctic territory, which is strategically crucial for its fossil resources and geographical position. How is the population reacting to American ''advances''? Why is the country so coveted?

programme.title: Géopolitis
programme.desc: Analysis, explanations, neutrality... ''Géopolitis'' offers an unbiased in-depth look at international current affairs, with accuracy, precision and a constant desire to make an increasingly complex and conflictual world easier to understand.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Français - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Français - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'Invité
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'Essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Maria Casarès, Albert Camus - Toi, Ma Vie
programme.desc: The actress Maria Casarès and the author Albert Camus had a passionate love affair as revealed by their correspondence. From 1944, the year they met, until Camus's death in 1960, they exchanged over nine hundred letters, proof of what a free woman she was, guided by truth and the absolute.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Cambodge, La Magie Khmère
programme.desc: From legendary temples to idyllic beaches, Cambodia is brimming with treasures. Steeped in rituals and beliefs, the country has found its own route to modernisation, as its capital city, Phnom Penh, clearly demonstrates. Far from urban hustle and bustle, Cambodians protect their natural and artistic heritage and their age-old culture.

programme.title: Ramón Mercader, Sur Les Pas De Celui Qui A Tué Trotsky
programme.desc: Mexico, 20 August 1940. Ramón Mercader assassinated Leon Trotsky. Who was he? Why did he do it? A Communist activist who came to the notice of the KGB during the Spanish Civil War, the enigmatic Mercader constantly disappeared, gradually moving closer to his victim. He never admitted his true identity.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Merci Professeur !
programme.desc: A short review of the French language, its quirks, accents and news.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Français - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Français - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'Invité
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'Essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: La Suisse Des Lacs
programme.desc: Spring has arrived in the Trois-Lacs-Jura region, and life returns to Lake Morat, Lake Neuchâtel and Lake Bienne. We meet Patrick, aboard the ''Romandie I''. In the Bernese Oberland, between the alpine lakes of Brienz and Thoune, Interlaken welcomes its tourists.

programme.title: Terra Artistika
programme.desc: Before becoming a painter Pierre Sojo had a passion for drawing as an art in its own right. Today his drawings also serve as preparatory sketches prior to his painting.

programme.title: Littoral
programme.desc: Momo and Mickaël are both blind. They sail at the Caen regatta, completely independently, or almost, simply following the voice of their coach, Henri, an essential link in meeting the challenge. Despite their disability, they sail as well as the able-bodied, even aboard something as complex as a yacht.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lévy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: La Belle Vie
programme.desc: Julien is welcomed by Anne Galant who hand-built her house on Prince Edward Island. She shares her story and explains how it led to her living a simple life in a haven of peace and tran-quillity.

programme.title: Libération(S), Dans La Joie Et La Douleur
programme.desc: August 1944. More than two months after the Landing, three-quarters of France are still occupied. The French in the North, East, and South live in a country at war and grow impatient. The Resistance tries to liberate certain cities, but bloody reprisals fall upon them. Hope fades away.

programme.title: 6H Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Télévisions editorial team.

programme.title: Télématin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauqué and Damien Thévenot at weekends.

programme.title: Salle Des Profs
programme.desc: A humorous look at working conditions for teachers through the trials and tribulations of five colleagues, unlike any others you've met.

programme.title: Télématin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauqué and Damien Thévenot at weekends.

programme.title: Papilles
programme.desc: The cliffs of Étretat reveal a different kind of Normandy. Join Michelin-star chef Pierre Caillet for an intimate journey between land and sea. A discreet and endearing chef, this Meilleur Ouvrier de France displays unfailing determination and boundless talent to produce creative and delicate cuisine.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Téléjournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: La Belle Vie
programme.desc: Julien is welcomed by Anne Galant who hand-built her house on Prince Edward Island. She shares her story and explains how it led to her living a simple life in a haven of peace and tran-quillity.

programme.title: Littoral

Despite their disability, they sail as well as the able-bodied, even aboard something as complex as a yacht.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'Est Dans La Boîte !
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Edmond Et Lucy
programme.desc: Edmond the squirrel and Lucy the bear cub grew up together. They live in a majestic chestnut tree in the heart of the forest. With their friends they solve riddles and live thrilling adventures, with every day bringing new wonders to discover in the natural world around them.

programme.title: Les Super-Pouvoirs Du Vivant
programme.desc: The animal kingdom is brimming with creatures that have extraordinary powers. To reveal the incredible inventiveness of nature and the importance of protecting it, each episode takes us on a fascinating journey rich in poetry and humour.

programme.title: Api !
programme.desc: Koro has doubts about Laeti: she seems to be scheming something. He talks about it with Api.

programme.title: Les Quatre Saisons De Léon
programme.desc: In the kingdom of Escampette, celebrations for the spring festival have hardly begun when the city is threatened by a terrible epidemic. Princess Mélie, crowned Carnival Queen, investigates with the help of Mélusine, the little hedgehog.

programme.title: Papilles
programme.desc: The cliffs of Étretat reveal a different kind of Normandy. Join Michelin-star chef Pierre Caillet for an intimate journey between land and sea. A discreet and endearing chef, this Meilleur Ouvrier de France displays unfailing determination and boundless talent to produce creative and delicate cuisine.

Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Au Bout De L'Enquête, La Fin Du Crime Parfait ?
programme.desc: They are all cases that were closed, considered unsolvable, sometimes resisting police efforts for decades until a forgotten clue, an unhoped-for witness or a forensic innovation finally made it possible to unmask the culprit. Alongside Marie Drucker, the criminologist Alain Bauer explains the technical, psychological, sociological or historical elements involved.

programme.title: Tv5Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Envoyé Special
programme.desc: In-depth reports, investigations, unseen interviews, detailed profiles, testimonies... The current affairs show that is always on the move, up close to events and all those involved!

programme.title: Foot! (1/2)
programme.desc: Match summaries, commentary and analyses, after each day of the Ligue 1 McDonald's, the French football championship.

programme.title: Foot! (2/2)
programme.desc: Match summaries, commentary and analyses, after each day of the Ligue 1 McDonald's, the French football championship.

programme.title: Les Quatre Cents Coups
programme.desc: The adventures of 12-year-old Antoine Doinel, unloved by his parents and misunderstood at school. Antoine lies, steals and plays truant. After a theft, he is sent to a young delinquents' centre from which he escapes to live out his dream of seeing the sea...

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: As Gil trains for the Deep Waters Challenge, he realizes that Lagoona is actually the right monster for the job. // Skelita learns to honor her Abuela her own way after accidentally ruining her gown for a fashion competition.

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Clawdeen finds that balancing school with her new role as Were-Ruler is way more challenging than she thought. // As she faces her first big task as Were-Ruler, Clawdeen makes a decision that will shake up the were-world.

programme.title: Game Shakers
programme.desc: Dub gets tickets to a VIP performance of the hottest musical of all time - Flavor City.

programme.title: 100 Things To Do Before High School
programme.desc: The gang each sets out to conquer their fears, but when CJ is faced with talking to her 8th grade crush, she needs the help of Fenwick & Crispo to cross this item off the list.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: A new super-fast villain is wreaking havoc in Secret Shores, and Billy is the only hope at tracking her down. After Billy's speed accidentally triggers an avalanche, however, he decides to hang up his cape and retire from being a superhero.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Max and Phoebe attend Parent-Teacher Night, leaving Chloe and friends home without adult supervision. When Jinx finds the Air Lair, he believes spies are targeting the school, and his meddling puts the Thundermans' school jobs at risk.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: When the Lair floods, April goes to save Splinter... but he won't leave the sewer! To make matters worse, the mutant called GOLDFIN comes with a warning... stay out of his way, or else!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Clumsy and Dimwitty want to help Rowena cure her sick plant, without knowing it was actually a trap and they are in fact helping her to catch Smurfs. // Rowena decides to turn Vanity and Storm into dolls to play with.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Scaredy Smurf is rescued by Lily and Blizzard. He'd also like a dragon friend to protect him. // Chef Smurf has accidentally brought an old cauldron back to life and it wants revenge for having been abandoned.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Patrick invents a new board game, and invites SpongeBob, Sandy and Squidward to play it with him. // After accidentally flushing Mr. Krabs’ safe, SpongeBob and Squidward must go into the sewers to find it.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob gets a pair of long pants, but they change his life in unexpected ways. // When Larry the Lobster opens a new gym in Bikini Bottom, SpongeBob becomes his best customer.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Sandy tries to study SpongeBob and Patrick’s behavior, but her science experiment goes horribly awry. // Mr. Krabs takes Plankton’s advice, and finally marries the only thing he ever loved…money!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: The Chum Bucket is replaced by a flower shop with a charming new owner. // The Krusty Krab enters a float in the annual Bikini Bottom Parade.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob and Plankton must work together to survive an island of deadly monsters. // SpongeBob teaches Patrick how to ride a bike.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Sandy's homemade snack becomes a big hit at the Krusty Krab. // SpongeBob and Patrick's favorite comedy duo has a falling out on live television.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob teaches Patrick how to ride a bike.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Patrick messes with the space-time continuum. // While Cecil and Bunny celebrate their anniversary in outer space, Patrick and Squidina throw a house party.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: When Vito's apartment floods, the kids try to find an apartment that suits him best.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne and Sid try their best to look for an after school activity to do together. // When Maria finally gets a day off, Ronnie Anne has to compete with her family for some much-needed quality time.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Tired of doing favors to get a ride from Lori, Lincoln decides it's time to help Leni pass her driver's test. // Lincoln conspires with the rest of his sisters to overthrow Lori's tyranny as their 'baby'sitter.

programme.title: The Loud House
